treatment.description: Erect, rather slender, up to 2 m. high, strongly resembling no. 154 but glandless; prickles of primocane remote, 2-4 mm. long; primocane-leaves merely grayish on unfolding, at first soft-pubescent but soon glabrescent or merely slightly pilose beneath; terminal primocane-leaflet cordate or subcordate-ovate, on a petiolule 3-4.5 cm. long; median leaflets long-petiolulate; racemes elongate, the longer ones 12-20-flowered; pedicels unarmed, the lower ones 3-5 cm. long; flowers 2.5-3.5 cm. broad;, calyx-lobes soon reflexed; fruit globose or subovoid, scarcely 1 cm. in diameter.
